hero.subheader: A project team is meant, above all, to be a learning experience. Given our mission of community impact, we want to help everyone learn and grow through our training courses in design, technology, and product development.

content.subtitle: Modern Industry-Leading Technologies
content.description: Trends in Web Development is a 2-credit S/U course that showcases modern full-stack development and best practices used within industry. We cover technologies like TypeScript, React, Node.js, Firebase, Express and more, all of which are deployed at scale by leading tech companies.
subDescription1: We emphasize best engineering practices for every element of the course taught, from API design to frontend modularization.
subDescription2: Learn how to deploy your web applications to the cloud using service providers such as Heroku or Google Cloud Platform.
subDescription3: The class ends with a final capstone project consolidating all the topics discussed in class, which can be used on your resume or portfolio.
